# Archinstoo Features

> Main advancements of the project.

- Priv esc choices (`base-devel-flex`)

- Per-user stashes, groups, and shells

- Multi-Profiles

- More encryption choices

- Patched `wayland` profiles

- Patched bootloaders selections

- Security choices

- More `Applications` choices

- `AUR` support through `grimaur` and `--advanced`

- TUI Menu QOL / More utility scripts
